channel.title: OldRune - 2006
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/n4gy6s.png[/img]
[b]Introduction[/b][/center] In a land far, far away, with people playing oldschool, featuring with woodcutting, fletching, cooking, fishing, and much more, along with the joy of killing one player to get the shed of blood, there, the land was known as, OldRune.
[center][b]Team[/b] Server Developers - I InDrEk I & Jake2008 Web Developer - I InDrEk I [/center]
[b]Latest Updates:[/b]
[ul][li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Firemaking done[/li] [li]Region Clipping[/li] [li]Clipped Following[/li] [li]Clipped NPC Walking[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Progress[/b][/u]
Red - not started. Orange - started/in progress. Green - finished.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li]PvP[/li] [li]PvN[/li] [li]Item Requirements[/li] [li]Special Attacks[/li] [li]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li]All Bows/arrows[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li]All prayers working[/li] [li]All bones buryable[/li] [li]Correct prayer bonuses[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]All spells working[/li] [li]Freezing[/li] [li]Teleporting[/li] [li]Alching[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]All altars[/li] [li]Talismans[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
[ul][li]Courses: Brimhaven, Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [b]Herblore[/b]
[ul][li]All potions makeable[/li] [li]Itentifying herbs[/li] [li]Weapon poisioning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b]Thieving[/b]
[ul][li]Stall Thieving[/li] [li]NPC Thieving[/li] [li]Correct anims & gfx[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]Gem cutting[/li] [li]Tanning[/li] [li]Spinning & Picking flax[/li] [li]Pottery[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
[ul][li]All logs fletchable[/li] [li]Correct interfaces[/li] [li]Fletch 5, 10, x, all[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img] [b]Slayer[/b]
[ul][li]All slayer masters[/li] [li]All slayer tasks[/li] [li]All equipments[/li] [li]Slayer gem[/li] [li]Correct task requirements[/li] [li]Slayer shops[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QusJe.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Emptying/Refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ores mineable[/li] [li]Gem obtaining[/li] [li]Randoms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]All bars smithable[/li] [li]Smelting[/li] [li]Correct anims, working interfaces & objects[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li]All fishing spots[/li] [li]All fishes fishable[/li] [li]Correct equipment[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Moving locations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li]All fishes cookable[/li] [li]All meat cookable[/li] [li]Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.[/li] [li]Cooking gauntlets[/li] [li]Correct anims & delays[/li] [li]Working interface with multiple amount options[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li]All logs lightable[/li] [li]Colored fires[/li] [li]Ashes[/li] [li]Clipped[/li] [li]Correct anims[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]All trees cuttable[/li] [li]All axes[/li] [li]Correct anims & gfx[/li] [li]Stumps[/li] [li]Bird's nests[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
[ul][li]All farming tools working[/li] [li]Trees[/li] [li]Compost bin[/li] [li]Tool leprechaun[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b]
[ul][li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Tzhaar Caves[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li]Questing system/Quest points[/li] [li]Tutorial Island[/li] [li]Cook's Assistant[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7DID9.gif[/img] [b]Music/Sounds[/b]
[ul][li]All areas have music[/li] [li]All sounds[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [b]Miscellaneous[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Clipped NPC's[/li] [li]Water Fillables[/li] [li]All npcs around the world[/li] [li]All shops[/li] [li]All doors working[/li] [li]Travelling[/li] [li]Ground Items[/li] [li]Correct Item Bonuses[/li][/ul]
[b][u]Media[/u][/b] Welcome screen: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/9qfker.png[/img] Lumbridge: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/fnr1bl.png[/img] Skill guides: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10oqyky.png[/img] Fishing: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/20kamth.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/rhld9c.png[/img] Cook's Assistant: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25jgltd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ipxmia.png[/img] Water fillable's: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mnod2u.png[/img] Doors: Opening/Closing [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/15hz7f8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14cb7zt.png[/img] Thieving: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/24xnhg8.png[/img] Firemaking: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/hwboe8.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/3469am8.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vsj59w.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/4j03fd.png[/img] Woodcutting: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zyj40j.png[/img] Mining: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/672rdw.png[/img] Tutorial Island: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/10dsb4z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/kb81fl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/19ulmq.png[/img]

item.title: OldRune - 2006
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

Scully:

Truthfully, I’m not understanding the need for over 9000 317 remakes. We get it, they’re easy to use, well documented, and have no need for XTEA keys for maps. That’s super awesome, I just don’t get why people have to keep doing the same shit? I mean you could make a kick ass server without it needing to be a remake. I’m sure this is more than awkward coming from me, but it’s really just too much work, I’d rather make something fun, decently challenging, and as original as I can get an RSPS.

I’ts not going to be an exact remake, we havnt really decided what we are doing exactly yet, for now we are just working on skills, minigames and content. Then we can easily shape it up to how we want it to be, we just want to cut out all the custom items and stuff though and keep it a strict 377 revision.

Read full topic

item.title: OldRune - 2006
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Truthfully, I’m not understanding the need for over 9000 317 remakes. We get it, they’re easy to use, well documented, and have no need for XTEA keys for maps. That’s super awesome, I just don’t get why people have to keep doing the same shit? I mean you could make a kick ass server without it needing to be a remake. I’m sure this is more than awkward coming from me, but it’s really just too much work, I’d rather make something fun, decently challenging, and as original as I can get an RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: OldRune - 2006
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Jake2008, post:37, topic:438122”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=540841.msg4024470#msg4024470 date=1340235756]

Looks alright so far. Just keep on it and don’t stop x)

We wont stop! thanks though, i know thers a lot of oldschool remakes atm that quit quickly lol.

Make sure you don’t quit, it just makes for a huge face palm.
[/quote]

We deffo wont quit, we can easily get this server to a point where lots of skills and content is available, then put it into an open development where people can play/test while we add new content, honestly shouldnt even take that long![/quote]

Good luck with that :).

If you need any website stuff done, feel free to pm me.

Read full topic
